name: CountdowntoVegasRaiders
0:
”Alexa, open raiders fan”
”Alexa, ask raiders fan how long until kickoff”
”Alexa, ask raiders fan how far away is kickoff in days”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: raiders fan
des: Cant wait until the Raiders kickoff in Vegas? Neither can we! This skill will tell you how long until that glorious day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
